```{r}
library("readxl")
library(tidyverse)
```



```{r}
covid = data.frame(read_excel("covid1.xlsx"))
```
```{r}
head(covid)
```

```{r}
cont.cols = c(5:11,14:17)
```



```{r}
par(mfrow=c(3,4), mar=c(4,4,2,0.5)) # Setup grid, margins
for (j in cont.cols) {
  hist(covid[,j], xlab=colnames(covid)[j],
       main=paste("Hist of", colnames(covid)[j]),
       col="lightblue", breaks=20)
}
```

```{r}
grouped.df = covid %>% group_by(STATE)
```

```{r}
grouped.df %>% summarize(POP.mu = mean(POPULATION, na.rm = TRUE), NEWCONFIRMED = sum(NEWCONFIRMED, na.rm = TRUE), CUMCONFIRMED = sum(CUMCONFIRMED, na.rm = TRUE), NEWDEATHS=sum(NEWDEATHS, na.rm = TRUE), CUMDEATHS=sum(CUMDEATHS, na.rm = TRUE))
```
